order in whichit wa gener so that the first pass is theonli on which hasto read the bulki problem orient inputthe doubl scan on in either direct perform by thefirst two pass allow the compil to remov object code which would be mosteffici is highli machin depend the discuss is in termof a fortran like languag although the techniqu is applicto most algebra languag cacm august 1965 gear c wca650801
